name: DROP 'N FEVER
description:
What happens when you mash up a block matching puzzle game and a bullet hell shoot 'em up?

DROP 'N FEVER happens!

Capture and shoot blocks to clear them as they come down row by row. Cleared blocks return fire; the bigger the combo, the more bullets you have to dodge! Eat bullets with your sword to charge up a screen-clearing bomb for when things get claustrophobic. Get into a rhythm and activate fever for big points. Rank up and collect medals to blast your score into the stratosphere!

Default Controls: Arrow keys
Move / navigate menu
ZCapture block / select
XShoot block
CSwing swordVDeploy bomb
SHIFTFocus (slow movement)
ESCPause / return
Features:
  • Customizable keyboard controls
  • Local high score tracking
  • Fullscreen or windowed play
Credits:
  • Vexing Voyage Games is Vanja Venezia
  • All art, music, and code is original outside of fonts and squirrel3
  • Alagard font by Hewett Tsoi (dafont)
  • Motorola Screen type font by R P N (dafont)
  • Squirrel3 noise function by Squirrel Eiserloh
  • Made with PyGame
WARNING:

DROP 'N FEVER contains flashing, blinking, and strobing elements in its gameplay and UI. Please use discretion when deciding to play if you experience epilepsy or any other type of photosensitivity such as migraines or eye strain, as these visual elements may trigger such conditions.

Thank you for your interest in DROP 'N FEVER.

Enjoy the block puzzle hell madness !!
